title: Chicken Salad

ingredients.content: 6 leaves iceberg lettuce, torn in half (approx. 180 g)
600 g chicken breasts, cut in pieces (2 cm)
1 ½ tsp fine sea salt, plus 1 pinch

preparations.content: Place lettuce in mixing bowl, cover with 1000 g water and chop <b>2 sec/speed 4<b>. Drain using simmering basket then transfer to a serving bowl.
Place remaining 500 g water in mixing bowl then insert simmering basket.
Add chicken, lemon juice, 1 tsp salt and chilli powder. Place Varoma dish into position and add eggs. Insert Varoma tray, add potatoes and ½ tsp salt then steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Remove Varoma then remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Cool eggs under cold running water then set aside. Place Varoma back into position and steam potatoes for another <b>5-10 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> until cooked. Meanwhile, separate chicken then set aside to cool.
Set Varoma aside and allow potatoes to cool. Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl.
Peel eggs then place in mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to serving bowl.
Add cooled chicken, cooled potatoes, tomatoes, celery and olives to serving bowl then place in fridge to chill for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, make dressing.
Place mayonnaise, cream and 1 pinch salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
When ready to serve, pour dressing over salad and combine. Sprinkle with chives and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: If potatoes aren't cooked in step 3, remove eggs and chicken then steam again.
Only assemble once chicken and potatoes are cooled and you are ready to serve.
